text: Vasily Savin (born 2 April 1967) is a Soviet skier. He competed in the Nordic combined events at the 1988 Winter Olympics and the 1992 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1967 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet male Nordic combined skiers Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the Soviet Union Category:Olympic Nordic combined skiers of the Unified Team Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1988 Winter Olympics Category:Nordic combined skiers at the 1992 Winter Olympics Category:People from Murmansk
title: Vasily Savin
